description: EatSure is not just a food delivery app. It's a foodcourt on an app, which brings to you food from multiple trusted restaurants in a single delivery. EatSure is also a promise, assuring 100% safety and hygiene in every bite you take. The food that we serve goes through 200+ quality checks . We believe good food is your right. And if you are what you eat, then why not eat only good?

structured_info.description: A food delivery app that operates as a virtual food court, offering food from multiple trusted restaurants in a single delivery. The company focuses on ensuring 100% food safety and hygiene.
